alert.note: Alert for Mason; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 2:35AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Menard and Mason Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 235 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Streeter, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mason, Art, Pontotoc, Loyal Valley, Fredonia, Saline, Streeter, Hedwigs Hill, Camp Air, Hilda, Long Mountain, Grit, Katemcy, Hext, Erna, Us-377 Near The Kimble- Menard County Line, The Intersection Of Highway 29 And Ranch Road 1222, Us-87 Near The Mason-Gillespie County Line and Koockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
